trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for all the easing functions.
trans-unit.target: 提供所有 easing 函式的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: You can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from this class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繼承自這個類別來建立您自己自訂的加/減速函數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation.
trans-unit.target: 轉換標準化時間來控制動畫的速度。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> property in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EaseInCore%2A> method to evaluate the easing function.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>屬性搭配<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EaseInCore%2A>方法，以評估 easing 函式。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EaseInCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation, which is a value from 0 through 1.
trans-unit.target: 正規化 （進度） 的動畫時間，也就是從 0 到 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: Double 值，表示已轉換的進度。

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: 提供您可以覆寫以產生的 easing 函式的邏輯部分<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref>自訂 easing 函式的模式。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法來轉換控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode><xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>的大小寫</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>的動畫的速度的標準化的時間

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method handles transforming `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> cases.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要指定您加/減速函數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>因為大小寫的實作<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>方法會處理轉換`normalizedTime`的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>案例。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation, which is a value from 0 through 1.
trans-unit.target: 正規化 （進度） 的動畫時間，也就是從 0 到 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: Double 值，表示已轉換的進度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the animation interpolates.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定動畫的插補。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *easingFunction* An object element for a class that derives from .
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*用於此移動 easingFunction*類別衍生自.物件項目

trans-unit.source: *easingMode* The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> enumeration that specifies how the easing function interpolates.
trans-unit.target: *easingMode*值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>列舉，指定 easing 函式的插補。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies how the animation interpolates.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定動畫的插補。
